Link for desktop
Removed handheld image with less quality and updated the OG tags to use the new one.
Link to medium sized image instead of giant one.
Link to favicon was only correct in /
Map when viewing report is no longer draggable, but can be zoomed.

Unzombie of reports
* Reports that were in a Zombie mode (yellow marker) could not be extended or closed. Now they can.
Change order of buttons

Improve edit UI
* The two buttons for close and extende were in in two line. No need as we have planty of space. Place both buttons in a single line.
